casebody.data:
MARY LUDDINGTON, et al., Plaintiffs and Appellants, v. Abraham B. MILLER, et al., Defendants and Respondents.

Before Barbour, Ch. J., Monell and Van Vorst, JJ,

Decided May 3, 1873. A. H. Dana, for the motion. G. W. Lord, opposed.

Opinion by Monell, J. Barbour, Ch. J., and Van Vorst, J., concurred in the conclusion.

Motion to dismiss an appeal from an order made at Special Term, denying a motion for a new trial on a case.

Motion denied.
